# Midway

# 1️⃣ The Winner's Circle 🏆 UP TO 10 POINTS!

Video of BEI employee winning prize from a game on the Midway

TIP

2 point for any prize. +8 extra points for a total of 10 POINTS! if its a top tier prize win.
